question_text:
Question 34
Consider steady, one-dimensional compressible flow of a gas in a pipe of diameter
 
1 m. At one location 
in the pipe, the density and velocity are 1 kg/m
3
 and 100 m/s,
 
respectively. At a downstream location in 
the pipe, the velocity is 170 m/s. If the
 
pressure drop between these two locations is 10 kPa, the force 
exerted by the gas
 
on the pipe between these two locations is ____________ N.
(A) 
2
350

  
(B) 
750

  
(C) 
1000

  
(D) 
3000
